src:
Primorska protutnjala kroz Novo Mesto
01 Nov 2019, 21:49 by Darko
Krka – Primorska 71:89 (13:23, 15:22, 24:32, 19:12)
U prvoj utakmici 5. kola ABA lige Primorska je opravdala ulogu favorita protiv Krke.
Ekipa iz Kopra je dominirala u Novom Mestu i uprkos opuštanju u poslednjoj četvrtini, stigla do ubedljive pobede, četvrte u regionalnom takmičenju ove sezone.
Primorska je pogodila polovinu svojih šuteva za tri poena (11/22), a prednjačio je Lens Heris sa 23 poena (5/6 trojke). Još jednu MVP partiju pružio je plejmejker Žan Mark Šiško, koga su tri skoka delila od tripl-dabl učinka. Šiško je meč završio sa 11 poena, 12 asistencija i sedam skokova.
U Krki su najefikasniji bili Jošilo sa 20 i Kouz sa 15 poena.
Subota, 2. novembar:18:00 Mornar – Cedevita Olimpija20:00 Partizan – FMP
Nedelja, 3. novembar:12:00 Mega Bemax – Budućnost18:00 Cibona – Crvena zvezda20:00 Igokea – Zadar

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Coastal marches through Novo Mesto
01 Nov 2019, 20:49 by Darko
Krka - Primorska 71:89 (13:23, 15:22, 24:32, 19:12)
In the first game of the 5th round of the ABA league, Primorska justified the role of favorites against Krka.
The team from Koper dominated Novo Mesto and, despite relaxing in the last quarter, reached a convincing victory, the fourth in a regional competition this season.
Primorska hit half of her shots by three points (11/22), led by Lance Heris with 23 points (5/6 threes). Another MVP was provided by playmaker Jean Mark Sisko, who split three jumps from triple-double performance. Sisko finished the match with 11 points, 12 assists and seven rebounds.
In Krka, the most efficient were Josilo with 20 and Kouz with 15 points.
Saturday, November 2: 6:00 pm Sailor - Cedevita Olympia20: 00 Partizan - FMP
Sunday, November 3: 12: 00 Mega Bemax - Future18: 00 Cibona - Red Star20: 00 Igokea - Zadar
